name: Fullmetal Alchemist: The Complete First Season (Full Frame)

reviews.name: Fullmetal Alchemist: The Complete First Season (Full Frame)
reviews.reviewText: The Fullmetal Alchemist series is quite simply a work of art. Visually stunning and emotionally wrenching, with an exquisite soundtrack, a plot that never disappoints or becomes predictable, and seamless character development. It transcends the anime genre and attaches itself to your heart, because it's not just about the Elric brothers' quest, it's about human nature and our search for ourselves. It is every bit as addictive and rich as the Harry Potter series, but is even more gorgeous on every level. This is one of the few shows I've seen rated everywhere with high acclaim, and now that I've watched it I can say that it is an experience that everyone should have who enjoys having a thing of beauty in their lives just for its own sake.
reviews.title: If you watch only one anime, watch this one

reviews.name: Fullmetal Alchemist: The Complete First Season (Full Frame)
reviews.reviewText: I watched the series when it was on Adult Swim in 2006. Wanted to re-watch it and this was BY FAR the best value for season 1 brand new. I am re-addicted and have no complaints about the product. This is one of my favorite series and I'm so glad I checked Wal-Mart's prices!
reviews.title: Awesome

reviews.name: Fullmetal Alchemist: The Complete First Season (Full Frame)
reviews.reviewText: Makes a great gift for any Anime fan!!!
reviews.title: Best anime ever and best buy ever !!!

reviews.name: Fullmetal Alchemist: The Complete First Season (Full Frame)
reviews.reviewText:
Coming from someone that HATES anime with every fibber of my being. This series was really worth watching. Unlike the anime with the same title with the addition of brotherhood to its name.

This series has everything a tv series should have.
reviews.title: One of the Very FEW Animes that is worth it's salt

reviews.name: Fullmetal Alchemist: The Complete First Season (Full Frame)
reviews.reviewText: Works great Fullmetal Alchemist is a must watch anime
reviews.title: WONDERFUL
